name: Dogù
description:
in this game you are dogù, you have to kill the monsters that line up in front of you and use potions and skills strategically.

the button on the left is the armory:
the stone sword deals 2 damage to the enemy
the damaged staff can deal 1 to 4 damage to the enemy
the button on the right is the inventory

This game is not yet complete so if you find any errors, please let me know with a comment
